name: question
description: Code or variable name used by cohort to indicate survey question. The value should map directly to a question that appears on the substance use questionnaire administered to patients.

name: response
description: Code or value used by cohort to indicate response value for question. The value should map directly to a response value that appears on the substance use questionnaire administered to patients.

name: responseDate
description: Date of response to the survey question; date questionnaire was administered to the patient.

name: questionLabel
description: Text string that provides more information about the question. Analogous to variable label used in a codebook. If available, this facilitates central mapping by the DMC.
example: Have you ever smoked?, How many drinks per day?, Do you use tobacco?

name: responseLabel
description: Text string that provides more descriptive information about response value. Analogous to value labels used in a codebook. If available, this facilitates central mapping by the DMC.
example: Never, Sometimes, Daily, 1-3 drinks per day
